thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Endeavour Silver Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.02

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Endeavour Silver Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.02
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Endeavour Silver Corp:
* ENDEAVOUR SILVER REPORTS FIRST QUARTER, 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS; CONFERENCE CALL AT 9AM PDT (12PM EDT) TODAY
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY GOLD OZ SOLD INCREASED 12% TO 12,674 OZ * BULLION INVENTORY AT QUARTER-END INCLUDED 85,675 OZ SILVER AND 302 OZ GOLD
* CONCENTRATE INVENTORY AT QUARTER-END INCLUDED 74,359 OZ SILVER AND 1,195 OZ GOLD
* ENDEAVOUR SILVER - FOR QUARTER, ALL-IN SUSTAINING COSTS FELL 22% TO $14.18 PER OZ SILVER PAYABLE
* ENDEAVOUR SILVER - QTRLY REVENUE $40.3 MILLION, UP 11 PERCENT Source text for Eikon:
